page.title: 13Family Life in Frithville
page.content: {5.00 am}My dad gets up. Then Dad has breakfast. Dad has Redi-Brek cereal. Then Dad goes to work at {6.00.} At {8.00}Mum, Jamie and I get up and get dressed and then we have our beakfast. I have toast and clean my teeth. Then at {8.45}we go to school in the car. At{9.00}the bell rings . Then we get on with our work. At{10.45}it is playtime. At{11.00}we all come in. At{12.00}it is dinnertime. We have packed lunches. I have crisps, sandwiches, biscuits and cake. At{3.30}we go home and when we get home I go out to play. At{6.00}we go in and at{8.00}we go in and I get changed into my pyjamas. Then at{9.00}I go to bed. Then at { {11.00}or{12.00}my mum and dad go to bed. Liza Dawson (aged 8 yrs)
